text: wma kuntum tastakhfwn eind artkabkm almeasy; khwfana min 'an yashhad ealaykum sameukum wala 'absarukum wala juludukum yawm alqyamt, wlkn zanantum bartkabkm almeasy 'ana allah la yaelam kthyrana min 'aemalakum alty teswn allah bha. wdhlkm zanukum alsyiy aldhy znntmwh birabikum ahlkkm, fawrdkm alnar, fa'asbahtum alyawm min alkhasirin aladhin khasiruu 'anfusahum wahlyhm
